title: The Water Boy
short_plot_summary: Bobby Boucher, a socially awkward water boy for a college football team, discovers his hidden talent for tackling and becomes a star player.
explanation: A grandma, symbolizing the strong influence Bobby's overprotective momma has on him, as she tries to keep him from playing football
An alligator, as Bobby's momma claims are ornery because they got all those teeth and no toothbrush
A water droplet, highlighting Bobby's role as the water boy and his dedication to providing the best water to the team
A football, signifying Bobby joining the Mud Dogs and discovering his talent for tackling and becoming a star player
A graduation cap, representing Bobby's academic achievements, personal growth, and maturation throughout the movie, as he gains self-confidence and independence
